publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8079 Jamie McGrigor: Congratulations to 2010 Lantra Land-based and Aquaculture Learners of the Year Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates all the winners named at the 2010 Lantra Land-based and Aquaculture Learners of the Year Scotland awards ceremony on Thursday 3 March 2011; commends Scott Simpson, who scooped the top prize as overall learner of the year; notes that there were 25 prize winners in all aged 15 to 29 in a range of categories including those for learners in agriculture, aquaculture, equine and trees and timber; considers the work of Lantra in Scotland to be very important in providing high-quality skills, training and education for what are considered to be Scotland’s vital land-based industries and aquaculture, and wishes all the winners every success in their future training and careers. Supported by: Bill Aitken*, Kenneth Gibson*
